// Import React Library and Fragment component import React, { Fragment } from 'react'; // Import useEffect and useState from React library HOOKS! import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; // Import the link & redirect components from the react-router-dom import { Link, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom'; // Import the connect function from react-redux library import { connect } from 'react-redux'; // Import PropTypes from prop-types library import PropTypes from 'prop-types' // Import our createProfile action import { createProfile } from '../../actions/profile'; const CreateProfile = () => { // Lets use HOOKS const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: "", website: "", location: "", status: "", skills: "", githubusername: "", bio: "", twitter: "", facebook: "", linkedin: "", youtube: "", instagram: "", }) const [displaySocialInputs, toggleSocialInputs] = useState(false); // Destructuring so we can use them as variables const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram, } = formData; const onChange = (event) => { setFormData({...formData, [event.target.name]: event.target.value,}); }; return (

Create Your Profile

Let's get some information to make your profile stand out

* = required field
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
{onChange(event)}} /> Could be your own company or one you work for
{onChange(event)}} /> Could be your own or a company website
{onChange(event)}} /> City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
{onChange(event)}} /> Please use comma separated values (eg.HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
{onChange(event)}}/> If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
{/* DISPLAY SOCIAL MEDIA INPUTS */}
{/* We want to toggle between showing or not social media inputs */} Optional
{/* If displaySocialMediaInputs === true then display this */} { displaySocialInputs &&
{onChange(event)}}/>
{onChange(event)}}/>
{onChange(event)}}/>
{onChange(event)}}/>
{onChange(event)}}/>
} Go Back
) }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ }); export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CreateProfile);
